dct_title_s: New York City Central Line Street (LION) 2008
dct_description_sm: LION is a single line representation of New York City streets containing address ranges and other information.
dct_creator_sm: City of New York Department of City Planning
dct_publisher_sm: New York City Dept. of City Planning
